title: On This Day: Senate rejects Robert Bork for the Supreme Court (National Constitution Center)
text: ( Source : National Constitution Center ) On October 23 , 1987 , the United States Senate held one of the most-controversial votes on a Supreme Court nominee in its history, when it rejected Robert Bork 's appointment. Two weeks earlier, the
